titles.title: Recognizing the United States Air Force's Air Force News Agency on the occasion of its 25th anniversary and honoring the Air Force personnel who have served the Nation while assigned to that agency.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 4/3/2003--Introduced. Recognizes the United States Air Force News Agency on the occasion of its 25th anniversary.Honors the Air Force personnel who have served the Nation while assigned to such Agency.
